scripts.export: rimraf dist && tsc && copy README.md dist
scripts.build:patch: npm run localTest && npm run export && npm version patch && copy package.json dist && npm publish dist
scripts.build:minor: npm run localTest && npm run export && npm version minor && copy package.json dist && npm publish dist
scripts.build:major: npm run localTest && npm run export && npm version major && copy package.json dist && npm publish dist
scripts.test: npm run transpileTest && nyc mocha && nyc report --reporter=json
scripts.localTest: npm run transpileTest && nyc mocha && npm run clean
scripts.clean: rimraf src/**/*.d.ts src/**/*.js src/**/*js.map test/**/*.d.ts test/**/*.js test/**/*js.map index.d.ts index.js index.js.map
